text:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle on Royal engagement

Meghan Markle, 36, will marry Prince Harry, 33, in a royal wedding ceremony on May 19 2018, and it seems the royal’s wife-to-be stands out from his previous girlfriends in one particular way. It is known Prince Harry had high profile relationships with Chelsy Davy, 32, and Cressida Bonas, 29, before he began dating Meghan in 2016. However, a royal expert has said no previous romantic interest had ever “tamed” Harry in the way that Meghan has done. “I think Meghan has had a really positive influence on Harry,” Katie Nicholl, author of Harry Life Loss and Love told Express.co.uk exclusively. “Historically Harry has always been ‘tamed’ by his girlfriends, we saw that with Chelsy and Cressida, but I think Meghan’s had a bigger influence on him than any other woman.”

Meghan Markle is said to have tamed Prince Harry more than his previous ex girlfriends

Katie went into further detail about the ways in which Meghan had “tamed” the prince. The changes include curbing Harry’s unhealthy habits – a change which has apparently caused him to be the laughing stock of friends. “His friends laugh about the fact that he’s now into juicing and yoga.” However, it seems Prince Harry does not take the teasing to heart: “He seems so happy and content and that’s all down to Meghan,” Katie told Express.co.uk. “He also drinks a lot less these days and he’s even cut back on smoking to please her. “I wouldn't be surprised if he had actually quit smoking for Meghan.

Getty Meghan Markle: She has tamed Prince Harry more than his exes Cressida and Chelsy, it is said

Getty Meghan Markle: Prince Harry previously dated Cressida Bonas

“He’s definitely healthier for being with her and one of the first things she did when she moved into Harry’s home, Nottingham Cottage, was clear out all the junk food from the cupboards.” Meghan leads by example, Katie suggested, and her lifestyle has influenced Harry. “Meghan’s a bit of a health food fanatic and that’s definitely rubbed off on Harry.” Yesterday, it was revealed that Meghan Markle and her father have fallen out. A palace insider has cast doubt on whether or not Thomas Markle Sr will attend the wedding, after revealing a shocking rift between father and daughter.

Getty Meghan Markle: She will marry Prince Harry on May 19 2018
